pkgmetadata.longdescription: Indices of Effect Size and Standardized Parameters // Provide utilities to work with indices of effect size and standardized parameters for a wide variety of models (see list of supported models in insight; Ldecke, Waggoner Makowski (2019) doi:10.21105/joss.01412), allowing computation of and conversion between indices such as Cohen's d, r, odds, etc.
